TopicTitle: symmetry mode in SPH doesn't work as a ON/OFF switch

Articles.Content:
Hi,

this is for modded install but I think it's may happen also with a stock one (Editor Extensions not installed, it's important here but I have add Part Select Window proto4, maybe there is a link, I'll dig)

In the SPH, I play with symmetry and I get stuck with the 2 mode, using X key just stay in mode 2 and doesn't go back to 1 mode, like it should

(I mean X => 1 -> 2, X => 2 -> 1, infinite cycle).

And in log I got:

ERROR: Animation index 2 is out of bounds!

2,3,4, number is the times X key was used (I get up to 25).

using shift-X decrease the symmetry counter and allow to get back to mode 1 (no symmetry).

Hope this help.

(KSP 0.25.0.642, on win 7 in openGL mode)
